column2: Guardiola ati 'Lionel Messi azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona'
column3: Pep Guardiola arahakana amakuru avuga ko  Lionel Messi ashobora kumuhamyva muri Manchester City, akavuga ko yizeye neza y'uko uyo mukinyi azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona. Imyaka yose y'umwuga wiwe, Messi, ubu afise myaka 32, ayimaze muri Barcelona, ariko mu masezerano afitaniye nayo hakaba harimwo ikigabane kimuha uburenganzira bwo kuja ahandi mu ci riza. Guardiola yaramenyereje Messi i Camp Nou hagati ya 2008 na 2012, aho yatwaye ibikombe bitatu vy'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru  rya Espanye, La Liga, hamwe n'ibikombe bibiri vy'ihiganwa rya Bulaya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, Ligue des Champions. Guardiola ati: "Jewe ndipfuza ko yoguma hariya [muri Barça]". Uyo mumenyereza wa Man City yavuye muri Barcelona asize ayifashije gutsindira ibikombe 14 mu myaka y'inkino ine, aca aja kumenyereza umurwi Bayern Munich wo mu Budagi. Yagiye mu Budagi gutsindira ibikombe bitatu vy'ihiganwa ry' Ubudagi, Bundesliga, mu myaka itatu ikurikirana. Mu Bwongereza, myaka itatu amaze amenyereza Man City amaze gutsidindira Premier League incuro zibiri zikurikirana, 2017/2018 hamwe na 2018/2019, n'aho muri uno mwaka ibintu bitifashe neza kuko Liverpool ifise ikibanza ca mbere muri iryo higanwa iyisumvya amanota 22 mu gihe hasigaye ingiko 13 gusa. Messi, umukinyi amaze gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu incuro zitandatu, ibikombe 10 vya La Liga hamwe n'ibikombe bine vya Ligue des Champions, afise amasezerano azorangira mu 2021 muri Barcelona. Hagati aho, aherutse gushikiriza amajambo atari meza ku wujejwe ukwinonora imitsi muri Barcelona, Eric Abidal, inyuma y'aho uyu Mufaransa yagirije abakinyi ko ata shaka berekanye igihe bamenyerezwa na Ernesto Valverde aherutse kwirukanwa. Mw'ihiganwa rya Espanye, La Liga, Barcelona iza mu kibanza ca kabiri inyuma ya Real Madrid iyisumva amanota atatu. Mu gihe hari abibaza ko Guardiola ashobora kuboneraho akarondera Messi kubera icuka kibi hagati yiwe na Abidal, uyo mumenyereza wa Man City ntaco bimubwiye. Abidal na Messi bompi barabaye abakinyi biwe. Avuga ati: "Jewe sinkunda kuvuga ivyerekeye abakinyi b'iyindi mirwi". "Ndibaza ko azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona". Lionel Messi yashitse muri Barcelona afise imyaka 13, ni ukuvuga mu 2000, aho yatanguriye gukira umupira w'amaguru mu bana batarenza imyaka 14. Yagiye atera imbere mu buryo bw'agatangaza, aho yaduga akaja muri Barça C, hanyuma muri Barça B, gushika mu murwi mukuru, ivyo bikaba vyabaye mu gihe gito cane kitari bwabeho. Mu kw'icenda guheze, uyu mukinyi w'igitangaza aherutse gutsindira agashimwe k'umukinyi wa mbere wa FIFA mu mwaka wa 2019,  ku ncuro ya gatandatu, imbere ya Christiano Ronaldo wa Juventus na Virgil van Dijk wa Liverpool.

column2: Abaguzi b'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi mu Burundi basaba guhumurizwa
column3: Nyuma y'aho leta ivugiye ko atacatitutse mu buryo ishirahamwe Brarudi rihingura ibinyobwa vyaryo, ababifata amakenga ntarahera kuko akanovera katakiri kakandi. Ikigo ca leta y'u Burundi kijejwe kugenzura ubuziranenge bw'ibidandazwa, BBN giheruka kumenyesha ko naho akanovera k'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi koba katakiri nka mbere, ngo ntacatitutse ku buryo bihingurwa. Ariko abafata ivyo binyobwa ntibashize amakenga, imyidogo ikaba ikiri ya yindi mu gihe bobo bafashe ivyo binyobwa bumva neza ko "bitakiryoshe" nka mbere. Haca rero haza umwitwarariko wo kumenya niba ivyo binyobwa bisa n'ivyahindutse ata ngaruka vyobagirako naho leta isa n'iyihumuriza. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abaguzi mu Burundi, Pierre Nduwayo, yabwiye BBC ko vyumvikanye ko ivyo binyobwa bifise icahindutse. Yagize ati: "Biboneka mu nzoga, twaratanguye kuvyumva cane cane nko muri za Royale (Amstel), hamwe n'amafana. "Ivyo n'imbere y'uko umushikiranganji abishikiriza imyidogo y'abaguzi twari tumaze kuyumva. Kandi na twebwe ubisomye urumva ko akanovera kahahora gasa n'akahindutse." Bwana Nduwayo yabandanije avuga ko Brarudi mu bisanzwe yahora inyaruka mu gushikiriza ibijanye n'ibinyobwa vyayo ariko ko ubu ataco iravuga. Yagize ati: "Brarudi twari dusazanzwe tuzi ko ari ishirahmwe rikunda kuza riramenyesha ibintu vyabo aho bihagaze n'ubwo hoba hari ingorane bakazishikiriza. "Ariko kuva iyo myidogo itanguye bari mu gacerere ntangere, ni naco gituma twovuga duti ahubwo nibave muri ako gacerere  bashikirize nabo kuri ayo magenga abaguzi boba bafise..." Uwo aserukiye abaguzi yabandanije avuga ko naho leta ivuga ko ata ngorane zihara, akanovera gafise akamaro kanini mu gutuma abaguzi bahurumbira ikidandazwa ico ari co cose. Rero ngo naho boba bababwira ko ata ngorane kandi bumva ako kanovera karahindutse, ntibibuza ko bagira amakenga.

column2: Christine Ntahe: Menya uyu murundikazi yahawe agashimwe ka Kenn Allen Global Award
column3: Umupfasoni Christine Ntahe w'umurundikazi yahawe agashimwe mpuzamakungu ku bikorwa vyiwe vyo kwitangira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu cane cane mu kwitaho abana bo mw'ibarabara. Ni agashimwe ahawe nk'umukorerabushake n'ishirahamwe International Association for Volunteer Effort kitiriwe Kenn Allen Global Award kaje kwiyongera ku bundi butari buke amaze kuronka kubera ibi bikorwa vyiwe amazemwo imyaka irenga 25. Christine Ntahe, Maman Dimanche nk'uko azwi cane i Bujumbura no mu gihugu, yabwiye BBC ko yatanguye gufasha abana bo mw'ibarabara mu 1994, igihe igihugu cari mu ndyane z'amoko zatanguye inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. Ati: "Naciye ngerageza kuba hafi y'abana bo mw'ibarabara, mvuga nti nta mwana ategerezwa kuba mw'ibarabara, ibarabara ntirirera. Ntangura kubaba hafi igihe amasasu yari menshi mu gisagara ca Bujumbura no mu gihugu cose, jewe nkaba nahambije abana bo mw'ibarabara bo mu gisagara". Mu mwaka wa 2000, umupfasoni Ntahe yashinze ishirahamwe Bon Geste ryo gufasha abana ba ntahonikora uhereye ku bana bo mw'ibarabara, impfuvyi n'abandi ba ntahonikora mu Burundi, igihugu cagiye gica mu ndyane zatumye biyongera. Umupfasoni Ntahe avuga ko yatanguriye ku bana cumi bo mw'ibarabara, ubu akaba amaze kuramura abatari bake, mbere bamwe muri bo bahejeje amakaminuza, abandi bakaba baciga. Avuga ko bitamworoheye kubera ibibazo vy'amoko vyari bihanze igihugu ico gihe kuko wewe yakira uwo ari we wese ataravye amamuko yiwe. Ati: "Ndibuka ca gihe Uburundi bwari mu bihano, nahora ngenda kubatora n'amaguru hariya kuri Place de l'Indépendance [ikibanza citiriwe ukwikukira], tukaza n'amaguru, hari henshi twaca bakadutera amabuye, ntitwari tuzi abo ari bo". Ntahe avuga ko impande zompi zamurwanya kuko ata ruhande na rumwe rwemera ivyo akora. Ati: "Irya ntambara yari iy'ubwoko hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi. Hariho Abahutu bamwe bamwe bambwira bati ntitukwemera kuko ntamututsikazi n'umwe ashobora gukorera iciza umuhutu ataco ariko ararondera. "Abatutsi nabo bamwe bamwe bakambwira bati 'umviriza, ivyo ukora vyose wiruka inyuma y'abo bana b'Abahutu, nibo bazoza kugukata umutwe'. "Jewe rero nta hantu na hamwe nari mpagaze, uretse guhagararira ukuri, urukundo n'ugukorera Imana kuko nabona ko abana bariko bazira ubusa". Ni ivyo bikorwa vyiwe vyo kwitangira abana vyamuhaye iritazirano rya "Maman Dimanche" rizwi cane i Bujumbura, avuga ko yahawe n'abo bana nyene asanzwe afasha. Avuga ko muri kino gihe afise abana bashika amajana abiri yama afungurira imisi yose muhira iwe. Kuva atanguye iki gikorwa, amaze kuramura amajana n'amajana, bamwe biga muri za kaminuza, zaba izo mu gihugu canke hanze, abandi nabo bakaba bakibandanya amashure mato n'ayisumbuye. "Ico babigiriye ntaco nzi, gusa barashimye, kandi iyo bashimye uvyakira uko. Jewe rero ni agashimwe kiyongera ku bundi, kuko n'umukuru w'igihugu yarampaye agashimwe mu 2012", niko Ntahe avuga. Ku bw'iwe, ivyo akora abikora nk'umuvyeyi arera abana biwe neza, hanyuma bakaramurwa. Ati: "Ubundi nta muntu yategerezwa gushimirwa ariko arakora ico yategerezwa gukora, kuko nico Imana ituremera kw'isi, kugira umuntu afashe aho ari mu vyo ashobora. "Mu mutima jewe nta kintu kinini nabona nkora co gushimirwa kuko mbona umengo hari vyinshi ntarakora. "Ariko gusa ibi vyerekana ko ivyo nkora bishimwa n'ababibona, mu kuvyerekana bakabicisha muri utu dushimwe n'imfashanyo nkenke baza barafashisha". Christine Ntahe avuga ko ata wundi mugambi afise uretse kubandanya afasha aba bana bo mw'ibarabara kuko babandanya biyongera. Ati: "Jewe umugambi ni uwo kubandanya ndabakurikirana, nongera ndabafasha kugira ngo bashike ku ndoto zabo. Ati: "Usanga abenshi ubabajije bavuga ko bashaka kwiga kugira ngo bazotere imbere. Bafise indoto, nanje indoto zanje ni ugushikana abo bana ku ndoto zabo". Uretse abo yafashije i Bujumbura, ubu baharurwa mu majana ane, hari abandi bo muri komine Mutambu y'intara ya Bujumbura bashika ku 600 yafashije kubera iyo komine yabaye ikiririmbiro ry'intambara. Christine Ntahe avuga ko ibibazo agira muri iki gikorwa ari vyinshi cane, cane cane bishingiye ku buryo, mu gihe "abana bo mw'ibarabara bakenera vyinshi kandi babandanya biyongera". Ati: "Abo bana baguma biyongera, ivyo kubafungurira ntibikwira, abana ugasanga barwara nkabura uburyo bwo kubavuza, ibi vyose ni ingorane zikomeye mu gihe ari jewe jenyene nibako". Christine Ntahe arashima ingene reta yitayeho ikibazo c'abana bo mw'ibarabara, ariko akavuga ko hari ingorane nyinshi. Hamaze kugeragezwa kenshi kuvana abo bana mw'ibarabara na cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, umwe wese akajanwa iyo akomoka kugira yitabweho n'abo aho avuka canke ubutegetsi bw'aho. Madame Ntahe yemeza ko hari ibintu bitagenze neza kuko "abenshi muri bo baca bagaruka". Ati: "Ntibaba bateguwe bikwiye, na cane cane abavyeyi babo, kuko abana bamaze umwanya munini mw'ibarabara, biragoye kubumvisha ko bosubira mu miryango yabo". Christine Ntahe avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari uko hari abavyeyi barungika abana babo mw'ibarabara. Ati: "Hari umwana akubarira ati 'jewe ntaronse ibihumbi bitatu ku musi sintaha, mama ntankundira'. Ibaze rero abavyeyi baguma muhira bakarindira ko abana babo baja mw'ibarabara kubaronderera ibibabeshaho". Mu gihe hari abagiriza reta n'amashirahamwe yitaho agateka k'abana ko ikibazo cabananiye, umupfasoni Ntahe wewe yagiriza abavyeyi ko ari bo ntambamyi nyamukuru mu twigoro two kubakura mw'ibarabara. Ati: "Ni ukuri reta n'amashirahamwe bakora uko bashoboye ariko rero abavyeyi nabo ni intambamyi". Umupfasoni Ntahe arashima ibikorwa n'abajejwe agateka k'abana ariko agasaba reta gukora uko ishoboye igahimiriza abavyeyi bagakurikirana abana babo. Ati: "Abatishoboye rwose reta ikabafasha, ibahimirize kugira baje mu mashirahamwe kugira ngo bashobore gufasha abana babo". Atera akamo amashirahamwe afasha abana gushira hamwe inguvu kugira ngo bashobore gufasha aba bana. Asaba reta ko yohimiriza abatware ku nzego zo hasi gukurikirana abana babo, bakamenya iyo buri mwana ari.

column2: Umunsi wahariwe abagore: Mu Burundi ngo baraciye akenge ko kwishira hamwe
column3: Mu gihe isi yaraye ihimbaje umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakenyezi n'iterambere ryabo, muri iyi ndwi turacihweza aho isemo igeze kuri iki kibazo c'uburinganire ku burenganzira hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Mu Burundi, abagore ngo baramaze guca akenge ko kwishira hamwe mu migwi yo gukorera hamwe, bikabatuma kuronka umutahe no kugwiza umwimbu n'ubwo ibibazo bitabuze. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru bisigaye ni ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina, aho mu ntara zigera kuri 19, harangwa ibigo bitatu gusa bishobora kwakira no gufasha mu buryo bwa mbere abakorewe ayo mabi. Ariko rero ngo ibintu biriko birahinduka mu nzira nziza. Ivyo Florentine Kwizera yabibwiwe n'uwujejwe umugambi w'iterambere ridakumira mw'ishirahamwe ACORD Burundi, Mme Sophie Havyarimana (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru ukanze kw'ifoto)

column2: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
column3: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.

column2: Wayne Rooney: Uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi wa England avuga ko yatinya ko inzoga zari kumwica
column3: Wayne Rooney avuga ko yari afise ubwoba ko yari gupfa canke akica umuntu kubera ibibazo yaterwa no kunywa inzoga. Uyu mumenyereza w'umurwi Derby County akaba n'umusatirizi wa mbere yinjirije ibitsindo vyinshi Manchester United be n'Ubwongereza gusumba abandi yabivugiye mu kiganiro na BBC imbere y'uko hasohoka ireresi nshasha isigura ubuzima bwiwe. Yashize ahabona ahantu inzoga be n'ibibazo vyo mu mutwe vyari bimugejeje, hanyuma abajijwe ikintu kinini yatinya gusumba ibindi muri ivyo bihe, yishuye ati: "Kumbure ni urupfu". Avuga ku "makosa" yakoze, uyu mumenyereza w'imyaka 36 yongeyeko ati: "Mfise kuba niruka inyuma y'abakobwa, mfise kuba nagendesha imodoka mborewe, ivyo narabikoze, nari gushobora kwica umuntu - aha urashobora kwiyica wewe nyene - aho rero niho uba ugeze habi". "Nari nzi ko nari nkeneye gufashwa, kugira ngo nshobore kurokoka ariko kandi nshobore kurokora umuryango wanje". Rooney avuga ko yumva y'uko yategerezwa kwigumizamwo vyinshi mu bibazo yari afise nk'umukinyi. "Imyaka cumi, cumi n'itanu iheze, sinari kuja mu cumba c'iyambariro ngo mvuge nti 'ndafise ibibazo vy'inzoga, ndafise ibibazo vyo mu mutwe'. Ivyo ntavyo nari gukora". Ireresi 'Rooney'izoshirwa ahabona na  ku wa gatanu ikaba ivuga ubuzima bwa Rooney kuva akiri umwana gushika atanguye akazi kiwe nk'umumenyereza wa Derby. Muri iyi nkuru, BBC Sport yatoyemwo ibintu indwi nyamukuru yavuzeko muri iyi reresi. Hari ahantu Rooney yemeza ko yari "umwana adashoboka" akiri umuyabaga. Aravuga atarya umunwa ko ari kenshi yisanga ari mu bugizi bwa nabi. Hari ahandi avuga ati : "Twahora tuja i Southport tukarwana cane. Aho vyagiye kurangira bahatswe kunkura ijisho. Nari mfise hafi imyaka 12". Rooney aravuga kandi ko yahoza aja mu mazu y'ubutambiro akiri umuyabaga mu nyuma akisanga mu ruhagarara. "Ndibuka igihe kimwe ko bamenye umusaya i Manchester. Nari mfise hafi imyaka 13." Hari ahantu Rooney asigura ibintu biteye isoni vyamubayeko igihe yari kumwe n'abandi bigana umupira muri Everton. "Umusi umwe nariko ndajabuka ibarabara mfise icupa rya cider [inzoga ikaze cane]. Umumenyereza wanje Colin Harvey, vyabaye ngombwa ko ahagarara akanjabukana. "Umusi wakurikiye, yanjanye mu myimenyerezo ambwira ati 'umviriza, wewe ufise italanto ihanitse cane ntari bwigere mbona ku muntu uw'ari we wese angana nawe - ntuyipfushe ubusa". Ku myaka 16, Rooney yari afise ubuhinga bukomeye ku gihagararo ciwe c'umugabo akuze. Muri iyo reresi, avuga ko yari azi ko ari we yakina neza mu myimenyerezo. Ku wa 19 gitugutu (ukw'icumi) 2002, niho yimenyekanisha kw'isi yose. Hari hasigaye imisi itanu ngo Rooney ahimbaze isabukuru yiwe y'imyaka 17, ico gihe Everton ikaba yariko ikina na Arsenal - iyi nayo ikaba yari iramutse ikina urukino rwayo rugira 30 itari bwigere itsindwa na rimwe ico gihe. Uyu murwi warimwo abakinyi bakomeye nka Thierry Henry, Patrick Vieira, David Seaman na Sol Campbell. Rooney aribuka neza ingene aba bantu bose bari ibihangange. Hagati aho, uyu muyabaga yashaka kwandika izina muri urwo rukino. Ati: "Uru ni rwo rwabaye urukino rwanje rwa nyuma nari nkinye mfise imyaka 16. Nabona umengo ntaco maze, nkaguma niyumvira, mvuga nti 'ndashaka gutera igitsindo ku myaka 16'". Avuga ko igihe yinjiye mu kibuga nk'umusubirizi yari afise iciyumviro kimwe: "Nkaronka akaryo na gatoya gusa, ndatera aho nzoba ndi hose". Ku munota wa nyuma, Campbell yameze nk'uwusubira inyuma, Rooney aba aronse akanya keza maze yinjiza igitsindo mw'ishuti yasarishije abafana ku kibuga ca Goodison Park. Uyu murwi wari uwa mbere mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza ico gihe, watakaje urukino rwa mbere inyuma y'ico gihe cose wari umaze utari bwigere utsindwa gushika n'aho umunyamakuru yariko atangaza umupira Clive Tyldesley yaguma atubwira ati "mwibuke iri zina" rya Wayne Rooney. Mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Bulaya mu 2004 ryabereye muri Portugal, Rooney yari inkingi y'umurwi w'Ubwongereza imbere y'uko avunika ukuguru, kuri we - mbere n'Ubwongereza -  ihiganwa rigaca rihagararira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma batsinzwe na Portugal. Igihe yari ashikanye imyaka 18 gusa, mu rukino rwa mbere, yarateye ubwoba umurwi w'Ubufaransa wishimira ibihangange nka Henry, Zinedine Zidane na Lilian Thuram. Ati: "Abakinyi b'inyuma babo baratinya kunyegera, babona ko batari guhangana na njewe". Igihe kimwe yakubise hasi Thuram, umwe mu bakinyi b'inyuma b'ibihangange kw'isi ico gihe, mw'ikosa ryahatswe gutuma ahabwa ikarata itukura. "Naramusetse, ndamukubita ku musaya nca ndahindukira ndamuraba, nk'uko umengo nashaka kumubwira nti 'ubu rero uramenye uwo ndi we'". Ubufaransa bwaratsinze urwo rukino 2-1, ariko Henry aremera ko Ubwongereza "bwabangamiye bikomeye" umurwi wabo ku buryo vyari ngombwa ko butsinda. Kuri Rooney avuga ati: "Waramuraba ukabona ko koko yari afise ishaka ryo gutsinda". Rooney ati: "Ndibuka igihe niyumvira nti 'ivyo ari vyo vyose ni jewe mukinyi wa mbere kw'isi' . Kandi ndemeza ko ico gihe, nari we mukinyi wa mbere kw'isi". Rooney n'umugore wiwe Colleen, bompi baravuga batarya umunwa ibihe Rooney yagiye ahemuka. Rooney ati: "Nagiye nishira mu bihe bibi, hanyuma rero iyo hagiyemwo inzoga hoho, usanga uriko urafata ingendo mbi kandi zikugirira ingaruka mbi. Gusa ibi ntivyigera binyaka urukundo mfitiye Colleen." Colleen aremeza ko inzoga zagiye zigira ingaruka mbi. Hari n'aho avuga ko atari vyiza ko Wayne "yigumana wenyene atawuriko aramukurikirana". Hagati aho, arasigura ingene we na Wayne bicaye kugira ngo batorere hamwe umuti w'ibibazo vyabo vyose bari hamwe. Ati: "Ndazi ko abantu bavuga ngo 'ubwo koko boba bari kumwe kugira ngo umuryango ntusambuke?' Ici cari kimwe mu vyo bavuga, ariko kandi turacakundanye. Ndizeye ko yagiye yiga mu buzima kandi ko atazosubira muri ivyo bihe bibi cane". Mu 2006, Chelsea, ico gihe yamenyerezwa na Jose Mourinho, yari itanguye guhangara bikomeye uyu murwi wari wiganje mu Bwongereza. Ku wa 29 Ndamukiza (ukwa kane) uwo mwaka, Chelsea yari yakiriye Manchester United ku kibuga cayo ca Stamford Bridge, irondera inota rimwe gusa kugira ngo itahukane ihiganwa rya Premier League ku ncuro ya kabiri yikurikiranya. Yatsinze 3-0. Rooney ntiyavyifashemwo neza na gato. Aremera ati: "Nari mfise ibirato bishasha, bifise imisumari (crampons/studs) miremire kubera nashaka gukomeretsa umuntu. Iyi misumari yari yemewe n'amategeko, ariko yari miremire gusumba iy'ibirato nari nsanzwe nambara". Yasekanye na John Terry bikomeye amuca intoboro ku kirenge haruguru y'ikirato ku buryo vyabaye ngombwa ko akenera ibitambuzo (crutches/béquilles). Haciye akanya gato, vyabaye ngombwa ko ahindura iyi misumari, ivyamugiriye ingaruka mbi kuko yahavuye akomereka, aho amagufa yo mu kirenge yononekaye, maze avanwa mu kibuga ari ku nderuzo. Rooney avuga ko vyose vyamuvuyeko akidogera kandi ibi birato vyiwe. Ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose ryo mu 2006 rizokwibukwa cane n'abafana b'Ubwongereza ku kungene bwatsinzwe na Portugal mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, urukino rwagiye kurangira Rooney ahawe ikarata itukura akomerekeje Ricardo Carvalho. Amaze gukora iri kosa, mugenziwe Cristiano Ronaldo bakinana muri Manchester United asa n'uwateye igitsure umuhagarikizi mu kumusaba ko yomwirukana. Rooney amaze kwirukanwa mu kibuga, amakamera yafashe Ronaldo akubitiye urugohe bagenzi biwe ba Portugal. Mu kwibuka ivyakurikiye, Rooney avuga ati: "Naramenaguye ibintu bimwe bimwe nshitse mu cumba c'iyambariro". "Ni bwo bwa mbere numvise ko ndi jenyene. Ndibuka niyumvira nti, 'turamutse tubandanije sinzokina igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma, kandi ndashobora no kudakina finale. Tuvuyemwo naho, ni jewe bizoba bivuyeko'." Rooney avuga ko inyuma y'iri kosa yabwiye Ronaldo ko ata "mutima mubi" yari afise mu kwifata uko yifashe, kandi ko bokwibanda cane gutsindira Premier League, ivyahavuye bigenda uko. Mukw'icumi 2010, Rooney yarababaje isi yose igihe asaba gusezera Manchester United. Yakoze kandi ibintu ata muntu yari gushobora kwibaza ko vyari kuba, mu guhangara umumenyereza Sir Alex Ferguson. Mu kwibuka ingene vyagenze, Rooney avuga ati: "Twari twagurishije [Carlos] Tevez, hanyuma tugurisha Ronaldo. Nio jewe mukinyi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru nari nsigaye". "Naragiye mu biro kwa Alex Ferguson mvuga nti 'mufise imigambi nyabaki hano?' inyishu yampaye yambwiye ati 'mvira mu biro'." Abahoze bakina inyuma muri United Gary Neville na Rio Ferdinand baravuga muri iyo reresi ingene bababajwe cane n'ingene mugenzi wabo yavyifashemwo nabi ico gihe. Hagati aho, Rooney abandanya yemeza ko bwari uburenganzira bwiwe bwo kubaza imigambi ya Ferguson ku bijanye no kugura abakinyi. "Wihweje ingene ibintu vyakurikiye imyaka itanu inyuma y'uwu mubonano, Alex Ferguson yari azi aho umurwi wariko uraja, yaciye yihutira kuvanamwo akarenge adatevye kandi gushika ubu baracarondera gusubira kwiyubaka".

column2: Intambara ya Ukraine: umukuru wa Kharkiv yabwiye BBC ko ingabo za Russia zavuye muri ico gisagara
column3: Umukuru w'igisagara ca  Kharkiv, Ihor Terekhov, yabwiye BBC ko Abarusiya bavuye mu micungararo y'ico gisagara berekeza ku rubibe rw'Uburusiya. Avuga ko igihe kimwe ingabo z'Uburusiya zashoboye kwinjira mu gace gatoya k'ico gisagara co mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko,  ariko ko batahamaze igihe kinini. Avuga ati: "Abarusiya babandanije batera Kharkiv  amabombe y'urutavanako kubera bari bagumye hafi y'iki gisagara. Ariko kubera ubutwari bw'abajejwe gucungera umutekano wa Kharkiv n'ingabo za Akraine, Abarusiya bataye baromoka baja kure ku rubibe rw'Uburusiya. "Ubu Kharkiv iratekanye kandi n'abantu batanguye kugaruka bukebuke muri iki gisagara. Abantu bose turabaha amazi, gaze n'umuyagankuba. Ikibazo gusa, ni uko amazu y'abantu yabomaguwe canke akononekara. Rero mu misi iri imbere tuzoba dufise igikorwa gikomeye co gusanura". "Haraciye imisi itanu ata ma bombe atewe muri kino gisagara. Icabaye conyene ni uko Abarusiya bagerageje gutera igisasu ca misire hafi y'ikibuga c'indege ca Kharkiv, ariko iyi misire yaciye isamburwa n'igisirikare ca Ukraine". Umukuru w'iki gisagara ashikirije aya majambo inyuma y'aho ikigo cigisha ibijanye n'intambara Institute for the Study of War, kibona ko Ukraine "isa n'iyamaze gutsinda intambara ya Kharkiv". Mu mwihwezo iki kigo giherutse kugira ku bijanye n'iyi ntambara, abahinga bemerwa cane mu vya gisirikare bavuga ko Uburusiya bwananiwe no kugota iki gisagara ca Ukraine kigira kabiri - kandi ko bwahevye uwo mugambi. Amakuru ava ku rubuga rw'intambara avuga vyabaye ngombwa ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziva muri iki gisagara zirukanywe na Ukraine isa n'iyariko "iratsinda" urugamba rwo muri kino gisagara, nk'uko bivugwa n'iki kigo cubahwa cane muri Amerika. Amakuru ya nyuma yatangwa n'iki kigo yashigikira ibi vyavugwa, aho umuvugizi w'ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare wa Ukraine yasubirwamwo na AFP avuga ko muri ako karere, "umwansi ariko ashira inguvu zose gukura ingabo ziwe mu gisagara ca Kharkiv". Ni mu gihe abanyamakuru ba Reuters bavuga ko kino gisagara kiri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko kimaze indwi zibiri gitekanye. Ariko bivugwa ko Moscou ikibandanya icucagira ibibombe mu turere two mu micungararo yaco - harimwo akarere ka Dergachi kari ku birometero 10 mu buraruko bwa Kharkiv. Mu masaha yitereye y'ejo ku wa gatanu, ibinyamakuru vy'Uburusiya vyatangaje ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zateye ikigo c'ububiko bw'ibirwanisho muri aka karere. Kharkiv, igisagara kiri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko, rimwe na rimwe gikunze kwitwa igisagara ntavogerwa. Iri zina cararironse muri ino ntambara. Kuva igitero gitanguye, intumbero nyamukuru y'ingabo z'Uburusiya kwari ukwigarurira iki gisagara. Ariko, mu kiringo c'amezi arenga abiri, uretse ko zananiwe no gushika kuri iyo ntumbero kandi ko - ariko ibi bikavugwa n'iki kigo c'abahinga co mu Bwongereza - zahevye uwu mugambi. Ingabo za Ukraine zivugwa ko zirukanye iż'Uburusiya gushika ku rubibe, hakaba hari amakuru avuga ko ingabo zo muri za ntara zishaka kwiyonkora kuri Ukraine za Donetsk na Luhansk zikaba zegamiye Uburusiya, zirindirijwe kwinjira mu Burusiya. Hagati aho, ibi si ukuvuga ko zasubiye inyuma rwose nk'uko vyagenze mu micungararo y'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. Kubona Uburusiya bwashoboye gusa gushinga ku nguvu ubutegetsi bwabwo mu gisagara kimwe gusa ca Ukraine - Kherson - vyerekana ko igitero c'Uburusiya ataho kiragera mu bijanye n'intumbero bwari bufise kuri Ukraine, nk'uko bivugwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'Ubwongereza bwo kwivuna abansi. Mu makuru ya nyuma bwatanze, ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ubutegetsi bwa gisivire na gisirikare bwashinzweho n'Uburusiya muri Kherson bwatangaje ko bugiye gusaba ako karere kegukira Uburusiya bubicishije muri kamarampaka. Buvuga ko mu gihe iyi kamarampaka yokunda, nta nkeka ko Uburusiya "buzokora amanyanga ku bizoyivamwo kugira bwerekane ko benshi bashigikiye ko biyonkora kuri Ukraine. Hagati aho, ubu bushikiranganji bwongerako y'uko kubona Uburusiya bwashoboye gushinga ku nguvu ubutegetsi bwabwo mu gisagara kimwe gusa ca Ukraine vyerekana ko intumbero shingiro yabwo yo "gushinga ubutegetsi bwegamiye Uburusiya mu turere twinshi twa Ukraine wananiwe".

column2: Burundi: Abasenyeri gatolika bavuga ko utunenge mu matora bakibaza niba ivyayavuyemwo vyizigirwa
column3: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'I Burundi (CECAB) ivuga ko amatora aheruka yo ku wa 20 z'uku kwa gatanu yaranzwe n'utungenge twinshi twatumye ivyayavuyemwo bibaza niba ari ivyo kwizigira. Mw'itangazo baraye basohoye kuri uyu wa 26/5, abepiskopi 'i Burundi bamenyesha ko barungitse indorerezi 2,716 mu makomine yose, zigashobora kuja ku tuzu tw'amatora batoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye niwe yatangajwe ku vy'agateganyo n'umurwi CENI ujejwe amatora ko yatsinze ayo matora n'amajwi 68%, Agathon Rwasa akaza ubwa kabiri n'amajwi 24%. Umugambwe CNL wa Agathon Rwasa be nawe ubwiwe, ntibemera ivyayavuyemwo. Uwutemera ivyatangajwe na CENI afise umunsi ntarengwa w'uyu munsi ku wa gatatu ngo yiture sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro. Mw'iryo tangazo, abasenyeri bavuga ko muri rusangi amatora yabaye mw'ituze, ariko y'uko hari utunenge twinshi dushingiye kw'ihonyangwa ry'ubwigenge, ukudafata kumwe abitoza n'abatora. Utunenge abo basenyeri bashira ahabona twashoboye kubonwa n'izo ndorerezi zabo aho zashoboye gushika ni utu: "Igitsure catewe bamwe mu baserukiye abitoza ngo batere igikumu ku mpapuro z'ivyegeranyo vy'ivyavuye mu matora imbere y'uko baharura"; "Amasandugu amwe amwe yashizwemo amakarata y'amajwi arenze (bourrage des urnes)"; "Abatoreye abantu bapfuye be n'impunzi"; "Abantu wasanga bafise amakete yo gutorera abandi menshi, ivyo navyo bitemewe". "Mu tuzu tw'amatora tumwe tumwe hari abantu batoye incuro zirenga imwe". "Hari abaserukiye abitoza be n'indorerezi birukanywe mu guharura amajwi". "Hari bamwe mu batora bakorewe iterabwoba baterwa n'igitsure na bamwe mu bategetsi banabaherekeza no mu bwiherero". "Abantu batemewe n'amategeko biyadukiza bakinjira mu bibanza vyo guharuriramwo amajwi". "Gutora mw'ibanga bitubahirijwe". "Bamwe mu bahagarikizi baratswe impapuro zibaha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira amatora banakwa n'amaterefone yabo". Abo basenyeri gatorika mu Burundi babona ko utwo tunenge dutuma bibaza niba ivyari vyitezwe gutangazwa vyizigirwa. Babona kandi ko hari abariko barahohotera canke bashaka guturubika ababanyi babo inyuma y'aya matora, babahora ko badasangiye ivyiyumviro, bagasaba abategetsi guhana abo bantu. Bati: "Mu gihe amategeko yemera ko haba abahiganwa benshi, buri munyagihugu yari afise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uwo yipfuza gushigikira". Abo basenyeri basaba ko uwumva ko yarenganijwe yokwirinda gukoresha imigumuko, agaca mu nziza y'ubutungane kugira ngo atunganirizwe. Mu matora atatu yabaye kuwa gatatu uheze, ihiganwa ryari rikomeye ryari hagati y'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi hamwe na CNL utavuga rumwe nawo. Imigambwe imwe n'abandi bitoje ku giti cabo ku mwanya w'umukuru w'igihugu baremeye ivyavuye mu matora n'ubwo banenze utunenge tumwe tumwe twibonekeje. Hagati aho, umugambwe CNL uvuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ukavuga ko washoboye kwegeranya ivyegeranyo vy'amatora vyerekana ko ari wo wayatsinze. Domitien Ndayizeye witoza ashizwe imbere n'urunani Kira Burundi, yabwiye BBC utunenge yabonye twabaye mu matora, ariko avuga ko "igihe uwatowe azoba amaze kwemezwa na CENI ubwa nyuma nta kizomubuza gutwara Uburundi". Umugwi CENI ujejwe gutegura amatora wowo wemeza ko amatora yagenze neza. Sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro utegerezwa kumenyesha ibiharuro ntabanduka vyayavuyemwo ku wa 04 z'ukwa gatandatu.

column2: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
column3: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

column2: Mu kwahukana, Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibirezo vya 200.000$ ku kwezi
column3: Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibihumbi 200 vy’amadorari y’Abanyamerika ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana mu masezerano yo kwahukana. Uyu muraperi rurangiranwa hamwe n’icamamare ku mboneshakure bazosangira kurera abana babo bane. Kardashian yuguruje urubanza rwo kwahukana mu 2021 inyuma y’imyaka umunani abana na West yahavuye ahindura izina akitwa Ye. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’aho amakompanyi atari make ahagarikiye gukorana na Ye kubera ukutumvikana ku bintu bitari bike harimwo amajambo y’urwanko ku Bayahudi. Mu kwa gatatu batangarijwe ko batakari kumwe , mbere na Kardashian ariyambura izina “West” mu mazina yiwe. Ivyo kugabura amatungo be no kurera abana navyo nyene vyaratorewe umuti muri sentare nk’uko biri mu mpapuro za sentare zashizwe ahabona ku wa kabiri. Impande zompi zizoza ziravugana ku ngingo zikomeye ku vyerekeye imibereho y’abana babo, nk’uko izo mpapuro zibivuga. Amafaranga azokoreshwa ku vyerekeye umutekano n’amashure vy’abana bazoyariha bompi. Vyongeye, Ye yiteze kuriha 200.000$ ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana – kubera, nk’uko ikinyamakuru New York Post kivyandika, abana bazomara igihe kinini kwa Kardashian. Bafitaniye abana bane: North w’imyaka 9, Saint 6, Chicago 4, na Psalm 3. Mu nzandiko zitari nke yasohoye imbere y’aha, Kardashian w’imyaka 42 yavuga ko yipfuza cane ko bahukana, akongerako ko ibi “bizofasha Kanye kwemera” ko uyu mubano warangiye. Imbere y’aha, Ye w’imyaka 45 yararwanije uyu mugambi wo kwahukana. Muri ano mezi ya vuba, yarateje impari, mbere n’amakompanyi atari make aramukurako icizere, harimwo Adidas, Gap, na Balenciaga. Uyu muraperi yaraneguwe bikomeye mu ntango z’uno mwaka inyuma y’aho yitabiriye indwi yahariwe umuderi, Semaine de la mode de Paris, yambaye agapira kanditseko icivugo ngo "White Lives Matter" – amajambo akoreshwa n’abazungu babona ko ari bo basumba abandi (White Supremacy). Mu nyuma yavuze ko abamunegura bahabwa amafaranga n’akarwi k’Abayahudi gakorera mu kinyegero, amajambo asanzwe akorehwa mu kurwanya abayahudi. Mu ntango z’ino ndwi, Ye yatangaje imigambi yiwe yo kwitoreza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2024. Yaheruka kwiyamamaza mu 2020, ariko yaronse amajwi 70.000 gusa.

column2: EU: Indangamuntu ya Covid-19 yoba isigura iki ku ngenzi?
column3: Indangamuntu nshasha ya Covid mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya (EU), Digital Covid Certificate/Certificat COVID numérique - "indangamuntu" y'iri shirahamwe yerekana ko waronse urucanco - iriko iratanguzwa hose mu bihugu 27 vy'iri shirahamwe. Ni nde ayifitiye uburenganzira, yoba isigura iki ku ngenzi? Ni uburyo bw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bwerekana ko abanyagihugu: Ibihugu vyose 27 vy'iri shirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya - co kimwe no mu bihugu vy'Ubuswisi, Iceland/Islande, Norvège na  Liechtenstein - birayifise kandi birayemera. Itangwa ku buntu - kandi abanyagihugu ba EU, co kimwe n'abanyamahanga baba muri ibi bihugu vya EU mu mategeko (bakaba bafise uburenganzira bwo gutembera mu bindi bihugu vyo muri iri shirahamwe) bashobora kuyivoma (download) bakayigumana kuri ngendanwa zabo, canke barakonswa urukaratasi rw'ikopi. Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari vyamaze gutangura kuyikoresha ku gushaka kwavyo - ariko rero ku wa 01 z'uku kw'indwi niho yatanguzwa icese, mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu. Izoba ifise code QR hamwe n'urupfunguruzo nyabwonko (digital signature key/clé de signature numérique) umuntu yisangije, ibi bikazoshoboza umuntu kwinjira mu bubiko yisangije burimwo amakuru yose ajanye n'incanco yaronse - nk'akarorero ibitaro, ikigo canke urwego rwamuhaye uru rucanco. Amakuru y'umuntu yisangije azoguma kuri iyi ndangamuntu yiwe, ntazobikwa canke ngo agumanwe, nk'akarorero ku kibuga c'indege, mu gihe bazoba bahejeje guhinyuza ko ari ay'ukuri. Abantu barizeye ko iyi ndangamuntu izokworohereza ingenzi gutembera mu bihugu vy'ishiramahwe EU. Ntabwo ari igitabo c'inzira - ingenzi izotegerezwa kuba igifise canke urundi rukaratasi urwo ari rwo rwose rwerekana ibiyiranga. Gusa, umuntu uwo ari we wese azoba afise iyi ndangamuntu, mu bisanzwe azoba arekuriwe kwinjira mu gihugu ico ari co cose atarinze gupimwa canke kubanza gutaramurwa mu kiringo kanaka. Si co kimwe - ariko zompi zerekana amakuru amwe kandi zifise intumbero imwe yo kwerekana ingene umuntu ahagaze ku bijanye na Covid. Ishirahamwe EU ntiriremeza Covid Pass, ariko ibihugu ku gatwe kavyo, nk'akarorero Ubugiriki na Espagne, biramaze kuyemera. EU ivuga ko iriko irakora uko ishoboye kwose kugira ngo iyi ndangamuntu ise n'izindi z'ibihugu bitari muri EU. Mu bisanzwe nta ngorane ihari. Hari incanco zine zose zemewe mu Bwongereza no mu bihugu vyo muri EU  - gusa hari zitatu mu zemewe mu Bwongereza rimwe na rimwe zizwi ku mazina atandukanye, ariko ni zimwe. Muri EU: Ariko, Oxford-AstraZeneca (AZ) yahinguwe n'ikigo Serum Institute co mu Buhindi (SII) ifise irindi zina rigira gatatu - Covishield. N'aho ari co kimwe n'iyo yahinguriwe i Bulaya, ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ntiriyemera. None hari ingorane kubona Covishield itemewe ku mugabane wa Bulaya? Covishield irakoreshwa cane mu bihugu bikenye biciye muri wa mugambi mpuzamakungu w'incanco uzwi nka Covax, ubu hakaba hari impungenge ko iyi ndangamuntu ya Bulaya ishobora kutemera ingenzi ziva muri ivyo bihugu. Ikigo ca Bulaya kijejwe imiti, European Medicines Agency/Agence européenne des médicaments (EMA) ntigitegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ikigo c'Ubuhindi gihingura Oxford-AstraZeneca, kubera ata ncanco ziva muri ico gihugu zinjira muri EU. Ariko ikigo Serum Institute kivugwa ko coba kibanza gusaba uruhusha muri EU kugira ngo gishobore guhingura Covishield. Ikigo AstraZeneca kandi kivuga ko kiriko kirakorana na EMA kugira ngo barabe ko "Covishield nayo yokwemerwa kuja muri izi ndangamuntu z'incanco". Gusa EMA ivuga ko gushika ubu itarigera ironka igisabo ico ari co cose kirondera ko uru rucanco rwemerwa. N'ubwo uru rucanco rutemewe gukoreshwa mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu OMS ryaremeje ko rushobora gukoreshwa mu buryo bwihutirwa - kandi n'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya rivuga ko ibihugu vyaryo ku giti cavyo bishobora kwemerera ingenzi kwinjira mu gihe bahawe urucanco rwa Covishield. Hanyuma kandi, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari bisanzwe vyemera izindi ncanco - nk'akarorero Ubugiriki buremera urucanco rw'Ubushinwa Sinovac, urucanco rw'Uburusiya Sputnik V hamwe n'izindi zitari nke. Urwego rukuru rushinzwe amagara y'abantu muri Afrika ruranegura cane ingingo y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya yo gukura ku rutonde ingenzi zahawe incanco za AstraZeneca zakorewe mu Buhindi mu mugambi w'iyi ndangamuntu ya Covid. Umukuru w'ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kurwanya indwara Centres for Disease Control and Prevention, John Nkengasong, avuga ko ingingo y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya itisunze ubuhinga n'amakuru yerekana ingene incanco zakorewe mu Buhindi zihagaze, kandi ata cerekana ko zidakora neza uzigereranije n'iza Bulaya.

column2: Coronavirus: Abandura mu Bubirigi bashobora kuba nka 'tsunami'
column3: Umwanya n'umwanya Ububirigi bushobora kurengerwa n'ibitigiri vy'abantu bashasha bandura coronavirus, nk'uko umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu agabisha, mu gihe ibitigiri mu gihugu bigenda vyiyongera ku rugero ruteye ubwoba. Frank Vandenbroucke avuga ko ibitigiri vy'abandura biri hafi y'ukuba "tsunami" mu gihe abategetsi "batagishoboye gukontorora ibiba mu gihugu". Ingingo nshasha zo kugerageza kuzitira ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera zatanguye kuja mu ngiro kuri uyu wa mbere. Ububare n'amazu y'uburiro birugaye mu kiringo c'indwi zine. Ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus ku mugabane wose w'Ubulayi biriko biraduga cane, ibi bikaba vyatumye ibihugu vyose vyo kuri uyu mugabane bisubira gufata ingingo zo kuzitira. Ejo ku wa Mungu, Ubutaliyano bwaraye bufashe ingingo ruhasha inyuma y'aho hibonekeje ibitigiri bitari bwaboneke vy'abandura ku munsi umwe, mu gihe ibisagara icenda bikuru bikuru mu Bufaransa navyo vyafatiwe ingingo zo kudasohoka mw'ijoro. Igihugu ca Repubulika y'aba Tcheques - igihugu gifise ibitigiri binini gusumba ibindi ku mugabane wose - kiriko kirihweza ingene cofata ingingo za guma mu rugo ku gihugu cose. Ububirigi kiri mu bihugu vyabangamiwe cane mu kiringo ca mbere ca coronavirus ku mugabane w'Ubulayi mu ntango z'uno mwaka. Muri rusangi, urugero rw'abahitanwa na covid muri ico gihugu rugira gatatu kw'isi ufatiye ku bantu 100.000, inyuma y'ibihugu vya Peru na San Marino, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ibiharuro vya kaminuza Johns Hopkins isanzwe ikurikiranira hagufi iyi ndwara. Kuva kuri uyu wa mbere, mu ngingo nshasha zafashwe na leta mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'iki kiza karanda kigarutse gushasha, abantu bazoba bemerewe kubonana n'umuntu umwe gusa hanze y'umuhana wabo kandi abo bishobokera bagakorera muhira. Kirazira ko hagira abasubira kwitembereza kuva isaha zitandatu z'ijoro gushika isaha cumi n'imwe z'igitondo mu kiringo c'ukwezi kuri imbere kandi urudandaza rw'inzoga rukaba ruhagaritswe kuva isaha zibiri z'ijoro. Bwana Vandenbroucke avuga ko ingene ibintu bimeze ku mugwa mukuru Bruxelles hamwe no mu bumanuko bw'igihugu "ari akaga gakomeye ku mugabane wose w'Ubulayi". Yambwiye imboneshakure RTL ko Leta "ifise ubutumwa bumwe gusa ku banyagihugu: ikingire, ukingire n'abakunzi bawe, kugira ngo ntiwandure". Nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo c'Ububirigi kijejwe amagara y'abantu, Sciensano, mu minsi indwi iheze, hibonekeje abantu bangana na 7.876 bandura buri munsi mu Bubirigi, ibi bitigiri bikaba vyaduze ku rugero rungana n'ibice 79% ugereranije n'indwi y'imbere y'aho. Ku wa kabiri, leta yatangaje abantu 12.051 banduye mu masaha 24 yonyene, igitigiri kitari bwigere kibaho muri ico gihugu kuva iki kiza karanda cadutse. Abinjijwe ibitaro kubera covid-19 nabo nyene bariyongereye cane, aho ku wa mbere igitigiri cagera ku 2485. Abategetsi bagabisha ko mu gihe ibitigiri vyobandanya vyiyongera ku rugero biriko, ibitanda 2000 Ububirigi busanzwe bufise vyo kwakira indembe bishobora kuba vyuzuye gushika hagati mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Alexander De Croo yabwiye RTL ati: "Ibintu ni bibi cane gusumba kure cane ingene vyari bimeze ku wa 18 z'ukwa gatatu igihe hatangura gufatwa ingingo za guma mu rugo".

column2: U Rwanda rurababajwe n’icegeranyo c’abahinga ba ONU muri DR Congo
column3: Reta y'u Rwanda ivuga ko ibabajwe n'utunenge turi mu cegeranyo c'umurwi w'abahinga ba ONU kivuga ko ingabo zarwo zabonetse mu bice bitandukanye mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Mu rwandiko rwaraye rusohowe nijoro ku wa gatanu, reta y'u Rwanda yamirira kure ibiri muri ico cegeranyo co ku wa 23 z'ukwezi ka cumi na kabiri guheze, igashimangira ko "ata basirikare b'u Rwanda bari ku butaka bwa Congo, kandi ko ata bikorwa vya gisirikare biherutse guhuza igisirikare c'u Rwanda n'ica Congo". Iki cegeranyo gishasha c'abahinga ba ONU kivuga ko amatohoza bakoze yerekana ibikorwa vy'ingabo z'u Rwanda n'iz'Uburundi muri ako karere ka Congo. ONU ivuga ko kwivanga kw'ingabo z'ikindi gihugu mu bikorwa vyo kurwanya inyeshamba muri DR Congo hatamenyeshejwe komite ya ONU biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Muri uru rwandiko, reta y'u Rwanda ivuga ko uyu murwi w'abahinga ba ONU wirengagije amakuru ngirakamaro n'insiguro vyatanzwe na reta y'u Rwanda, mu gihe bari "bahawe uburenganzira bwo gushikira inzego zitandukanye za reta, banoroherezwa kuvugana n'ivyabona kandi banahabwa n'inyishu ku bibazo vyose babajije". Reta y'u Rwanda ibona ko uyu murwi ata bwigenge ufise mu vyegeranyo vyawo, mbere ko abawugize bafata minenerwe amabanga yabo. U Rwanda ruvuga ko rushimishwa n'imigenderanire myiza irangwa hagati yarwo na Congo mu bisata bitandukanye, harimwo n'ugufashanya mu vya gisirikare, ariko bikagarukira gusa, nk'uko iri tangazo ribivuga, "ku guhanahana amakuru ku mirwi y'inyeshamba iri mu buseruko bwa Congo, itera umudugararo mu bihugu vyompi". Reta y'Uburundi yoyo ntaco irashikiriza kuri iki cegeranyo gishasha c'aba bahinga ba ONU kivuga ko hari ingabo z'u Burundi n'Imbonerakure babonetse mu duce twa Fizi na Uvira mu ntara ya  Kivu y'Ubumanuko hagati y'ukwa 11/2019 n'ukwa 07/2020. Hagati aho, mu kwa kane kw'umwaka uheze, umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Jean Claude Karerwa yabwiye BBC mu butumwa bwanditse , ata basirikare b'Uburundi bari mu kindi gihugu mu buryo butazwi.

column2: China: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano Li Yundi yapfunzwe yagirizwa kugura imaraya
column3: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano mu Bushinwa, Li Yundi, apfunzwe azira gusambana n'imaraya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta. Ku rubuga hwaniro, igipolisi canditse ko umugabo w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'imaraya y'imyaka 29, bemeye ko bakoze ibintu bitemewe n'amategeko. Bafashwe inyuma y'aho abanyagihugu batangiye iyo nkuru ku bategetsi. Mu gihe igipolisi kitashize ahabona izina ryiwe, ikinyamakuru ca reta mu nyuma cemeje ko ari Li. Iyo nkuru yababaje abakunzi benshi b'uwo mugabo azwi kw'izina rya "China Piano Prince". Ku myaka 18, Li yabaye umuntu wa mbere akiri muto avuza piano - ahawe agashimwe ka mbere gakomeye mpuzamakungu ka Chopin Piano Competition mu 2000. Yabandanije avuza piano hirya no hino kw'isi, akaba n'umuntu azwi cane mu bantu bavuga ururimi rw'igishinwa. Umuntu umwe yanditse ku rubuga hwaniro rwa Weibo rumeze nka Twitter ati:"Mana yanje, biratangaje. Uyu ni Li Yundi twese dutangarira?" Abandi berekana amakenga ku kuntu yafashwe. Undi yanditse ngo:"Mfise amakenga yo kumenya ingene abantu bamenye ko ari we. Ubonye umugabo w'imyaka 39 n'umugore w'imyaka 29 binjiye mu nzu bari kumwe, bigenda gute ngo abantu bamenye ko ari imaraya, na we ari umukiriya wiwe?" Inyuma y'aho iyo nkuru imenyekaniye, ishirahamwe ry'abanyamuziki mu Bushinwa ryavuze ko rigiye kwaka ubunywanyi Li kuko "atanga isura mbi cane mu bantu". Bamwe mu baraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko ipfungwa ryiwe rishobora gufatwa nk'igabishwa ku nyifato mbi y'abandi ba rurangiranwa mu gihe Ubushinwa bwahagurukiye abakora akazi kerekeye umuziki. Mu mategeko yo mu Bushinwa, abasambana canke bagurisha imaraya bashobora gupfungwa gushika ku misi 15 bakanatangisha n'amande ashobora gushika ku madolari ya amerika 782.

column2: France: Urugendo rurerure rwa 'Extreme-droite' rwo gushikira ubutegetsi mu Bufaransa
column3: Marine Le Pen yaragize urugendo, ashikana umugambwe wa 'Extreme-droite' (uhagaze ku migenzo ya kera no gudashima abimukira) mu kibanza ushobora gukabakaba ubutegetsi mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. N'inyuma y'aho asubiriye se wiwe ku burongozi bwa Front National, muri 2011, yamaze imyaka agerageza gushika ku rugero rwo kuwukurako iceyi, rwari rukenewe kugira wiyumve nk'umugambwe wimirije gufata ubutegetsi. Politike yiwe ku bimukira no gushira imbere guha inzu n'akazi abafaransa yarabigumije, ariko uwo mupfasoni arongoye uwo mugambwe wa Front National yerekana isura y'umuntu ari hagati na hagati kandi atahurwa n'abantu benshi. "Ego ndi umuntu yorora inyabu yabigize umwuga, mu yindi nzira ndi umurimyi," uko ni ko yavugiye kuri France Inter mu kwezi kwa mbere. Le Pen afise inyabu zitandatu kandi ziragaragara ku mavideo yo ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Tik Tok eka mbere no ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Instagram. Igihe umuhinga muri politike Chloe Morin yabaza umugwi w'abazitaba amatora i Lille mu mwaka uheze uko babona uwo mudamu, inyabu ni zo zaza imbere. Ni nde atokwizera urya mupfasoni w'inyabu? Ashobora kuboneka nk'umuntu ari hagati na hagati, ariko politike yiwe nta ho itandukaniyeko n'iyahahoze ku bimukira, ku bwenegihugu no kuri Islam. Emmanuel Macro yavuze ko politike yiwe ishingiye ku macakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba. James Shields, yigisha igifaransa muri kaminuza ya Warwick avuga ko amajambo yerekana amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba atagikoreshwa. Ariko amategeko n'ingingo vy'uwo mugambwe wa se wiwe umaze igihe kirekire vyo kugwanya abimukira ntibirahinduka na gato. Le Pen agiye mu ngunga ya kibiri y'amatora yo ku musi w'Imana afise amahirwe yo gutsinda. Bitandukanye no mu myaka itanu iheze aho atari yiteguye, aho yabuze ayo acira n'ayo amira mu kiganiro co ku mboneshakure imbere y'amatora Macron yatsinze aronse ibice bibiri kuri bitatu vy'amajwi. Ariko aramaze kuvyifatamwo neza gusumba se wiwe, Jean-Marie Le Pen, yatsindiye kuja mu ngunga ya kabiri y'amatora mu 2002 yishimikije kugwanya abimukira  no gusubiza igihugu ku murongo. Yatsinzwe kubera ibice 82% biyamirije politike yiwe bagereranije n'ubumara. Uwo yari umugabo atahengeshanije kuvuga, kuva mu 1987, ko ivyumba vy'abanazi biciramwo abantu hakoreshejwe gaz ari "akantu gato kabaye mu ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose" kandi yagumye yagirizwa urwanko ku bayahudi. Imyiyamamazo yiwe ubu ifise ivyivugo vya Marine prezida kandi "Ku bafaransa bose". Nta zina rya Le Pen rivugwa, ukwikurako iceyi gusa n'ukuriko kurakunda. Afise imyaka icenda, ni ho yabona uko se wiwe ameze, igihe yacika kw'icumu ku gitero ca bombe co mu 1976, cononye cane inzu y'umuryango wa Le Pen hagati mu gisagara ca Paris. Mu gitabo c'ubuzima bw'iwe arasigura ingene we na bakuru we babiri "bari bapfukamye hasi, bagugumwa, bafatanye amaboko... aho twumva ijwi rya data avugira hejuru: "Bakobwa bakobwa muracari bazima?" Mu nyuma, abana bigana bahawe itegeko ryo kutamwegera: "Haciye hashirwaho umuzingi wo kwikingira iruhande yacu - Ntimwegere ba Le Pen." Hanyuma igihe yari afise imyaka 16, nyina wiwe Pierrette yaciye ajana n'umwanditsi w'igitabo c'ubuzima bwa se wiwe. Ku mwana w'umuyabaga nka Marine, cabaye igihe kibabaje catumye yegera cane se wiwe. Mu gitabo c'ubuzima bwiwe casohotse mu 2011 avuga ati: "Namaze ukwezi kose n'igice nyogwa buri musi. Ntivyakunda ko nigaburira." Imyaka yamaze muri ivyo bintu yatumye akomantara cane inyuma nk'uko asanzwe abizwiko. Agatwengo yerekana imbere y'abafata amafoto kamara umwanya urume rumara. Umugenzi wiwe Steeve Briois yabwiye BBC ati: "Inyuma y'ibintu vyose yaciyemwo mu buto bwiwe, yaciye yiyugara". Yagumye ari umugenzi wiwe wa hagafi, nk'umukuru w'igisagara afise ku muzirikanyi ca Henin-Beaumontm mu buraruko bw'Ubufaransa. Inyuma yo kuronka urupapuro rw'umutsindo muri imwe muri za kaminuza z'i Paris zigisha amategeko mu ntango za 1990, yaciye akora akazi ko kuburanira abadashobora kuronaka amahera yo kuriha abashingwamanza. Rimwe na rimwe wasanga harimwo abimukira badakurikije amategeko. Babimubajije mu nyuma, yavuze ko atabona ahari ubudasa: "Ni ibiremwa muntu, barafise uburenganzira, ntawobarenganya ku bijanye na politike y'abimukira." Umushingwamanza w'i Paris, Basile Ader yabwiye BBC ati: "Ndatangarira ingene aguma atuje kandi akanashobora kugumana imigenderanire myiza mu kazi n'aho yaba yikoreye umuzigo w'uko se wiwe avugwa." Mu 1998, ntiyari bwamenyere neza akazi. Narababajwe n'ingene abandi bashingwamanza bamwigira kure kubera politike ya se wiwe. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, yaciye ava muri ako kazi, agenywe mu kibanza co hejuru kiraba ivyo amategeko muri Front National. Hariho akantu ka mpinga yanje aho mu 2004 yaratowe nk'umushingamateka w'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Buraya anamarayo imyaka 13. Ugutandukana na se. N'imbere y'uko asubirira se wiwe  nk'umukuru wa Front National, vyaragaragara ko afise amakenga kuri bimwe mu vyiyumviro vyerekeye kahise k'abanazi. Igihe mu 2005, Jean-Marie Le Pen yabwira ikinyamakuru ca 'Extreme-droite' ko igihe abadagi bigarurira Ubufaransa "ata bikorwa bibi vyakorewe abantu n'aho habaye amakosa amwe amwe", yariyumviriye gutanga imihoho mu mabanga y'icegera ciwe. Umuhanuzi wiwe Bruno Bilde avuga ko mu mutima wiwe yaniyumviriye guheba politike. Kazoza ka se wiwe kagiye kwerekanwa n'igihe mu matora ya 2007 yaronka amajwi 10% hanyuma mu kiringo c'imyaka ine, Marine Le Pen ni we yahagarariye umugambwe. Igihe yariko ariyamamariza kurongora uwo mugambwe, isura ya kazoza ya Front National yarateje agashavu. Yabwiye abamushigikiye i Lyon ko kubona aba Islam bariko barasengera mu mabarabara vyasa n'igihe abanazi bigarurira Ubufaransa. Ubwa mbere haje "ukwongerekana kwo kwambara ibitambara" hanyuma "ukwiyongera kwa Burkha". Ubu nta bimodoka bitamenwa canke abasirikare bahari "ariko haracari ukwigarurirwa kandi biraremera abanyagihugu". "Extreme-droite ni isura y'ubuntu" ni ko umufaransa Bernard-Henri Lévy yagereranije Marine mu gihe kimwe. Yaranakuweko iceyi co guhembera urwanko. Yaciye kandi yihutira kwikurako bamwe mu batama bari bashigikiye Le Pen, benshi muri bo berekana ko bashima intwaro ya Vichy yakoranye n'aba Nazi mu ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Ariko guha amahera "Extreme-droite" mu Bufaransa biracaboneka nabi ku buryo yagiye gusaba ideni Uburusiya rya miliyoni 11 z'ama Euro mu mwaka Vladimir Putin yigarura ubutaka bwa Ukraine. Yaranashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya mu matora y'amayeri yo kwigarurira Crime. Le Pen yashize inguvu nyinshi k'uco abona kibangamiye ubuzima bw'abafaransa: "Ikwiragira rya Islam, gufatira mu kivunga, EU n'ifaranga rya Euro. Mu matora ya 2012 yabaye uwa gatatu. Mu 2017, Front National yari irongowe n'urwaruka rw'abahinga mu gukoresha YouTube aho baronse ababashigikira benshi hirya no hino mu Bufaransa. Uwo mugambwe wararonse intsinzi mu matora y'ibanze, aya Buraya hamwe n'ay'uturere, unavuga ko ufise aba Islam n'abayahudi bawushigikiye. N'aho yatsinzwe cane na Emmanuel Macron mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu, yararonse amajwi ashika ku miliyoni 7.7. Yoba yaramaze ubumara muri 'Extreme-droite'? Inyuma y'imyaka itanu, ashobora kwishimira kuba yaratumye uwo mugambwe ushobora gutorwa mbere cane, kubera izina ryoroheje rya Rassemblement National no kwemerera abantu kwicisha bugufi bitangukanye n'ivyo bagiriza prezida ko aterekwa abantu bato bato. Ariko aratembera mw'isoko yemereye abantu ko "Nzotwara igihugu nk'umuvyeyi - ata gusesagura kandi nkurikije uko bibereye". Mu gihe rero ingorane ya mbere y'amatora ari ingene ubuzima bugenda buzimba, yibanze cane ku kugira imyiyamamazo kuri ico kintu. Abantu ntibagishoboye gutunga imodoka: Yavuze vyo. Prof James Shields yagize ati: "Imigambi ya Rassemblement National  co kimwe n'iya Front National yayitanguriye, iracubakiye ku bafaransa ubwabo ubwa mbere, kubaronsa akazi imbere y'abandi, amazu, imfashanyo zo mu mibano hamwe n'amagara yabo. Yibaza ko Le Pen ashobora kutabandanya ashigikira kuva muri Eu, ariko imigambi yiwe ishobora gutuma haba ugukwaruzanya, bishobora gutuma impera n'imperuka Ubufaransa bukura meza muri iryo shirahamwe. Ku ba Islam b'abafaransa, ivyo asaba vyo kwirinda kwitwikira mu bibanza bigenewe abantu benshi birabateye amakenga cane. Igihe umupfasoni ari mu karuhuko k'iza bukuru yitwikiriye yamuhamagarira kubaha amahoro mu ndwi iheze, Le Pen yavuze ko mu bice bimwe bimwe biba ngombwa ko abapfasoni bitwikira kugira ntibahave babonwa nabi. Uwo mupfasoni yitwa Fatima, yasiguye ko yatanguye kwitwikira amaze gukura, ashaka kuvuga ko yari afise abuzukuru. Le Pen yagirizwa n'abo bahanganye ko yiyamamariza gusa aho afise abanywanyi. Ariko igihe abamwiyamiriza batangura gusemerera ngo "Fasciste" bakamusaba gukinjura, yaragerageje kubandanya amwenyura, avuga ko uko inyishu zikariha ari na ko aguma aronka amahirwe yo gutsinda amatora. Mu gihe yotahukana intsinzi, se wiwe Jean-Marie Le Pen ashobora kunezerwa cane. Ariko abandanya yemeza ko hari "ibihumbi" vy'ubudasa hagati yabo. Marine yasiguye ati: "Yari prezida w'umuhari mu ntango wo kwerekana akababaro hanyuma uhinduka uwutavuga rumwe na reta. Naratunganije akazi ku migwi yanje "ku buryo dushobora kuja ku butegetsi tukanashira mu bikorwa ivyiyumviro vyacu".

column2: DR Congo: Inama nshingamateka yabogoje umukuru wayo asanzwe acuditse na Kabila
column3: Inama nshingamateka ya Repubulika y'Intwaro rusangi ya Congo yemeje ko umukuru wayo abogozwa. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho inama nshingamateka isohoreye urwandiko rwo kwiyamiriza uyu mukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Jeanine Mabunda, asanzwe acuditse cane na Josepf Kabila, hamwe n'abo bakorana, bakagirizwa uburongozi bubi. Iyi ni intsinzi kuri Perezida Félix Tshisekedi amaze igihe atumvikana n'uwo yasubiriye, Perezida Kabila. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, haradutse akaguma mu nama nshingamateka, biba ngombwa ko igipolisi kiza kubanguranya abari bashamiranye. Jeanine Mabunda, umukuru w'iyi nama nshingamateka, ni akadasohoka na Josepf Kabila, akaba yabogojwe n'amajwi 281 kuri 200. Niwe mukenyezi wa mbere yari yizigiwe ngo arongore inama nshingamateka ya Congo, ariko mu nyuma ico cizere bari bamuhaye kikaba cagiye gisubira inyuma. Abashingamateka begamiye ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi bamwagiriza ko ahengamira ku ruhande rwa Kabila mu ngingo ziwe, arico gituma yabogojwe. Wewe arahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Aya matora yatumye abashingamateka benshi baja ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi. Ubu rero, ni akanya keza kuri we ko gushira mu ngiro imigambi yatangaje ku wa Mungu uheze, harimwo gushinga reta nshasha avuga ko yomworohereza gukorera bikwiye abanyagihugu ba Congo. Iri bogozwa ry'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ni uruhombo rudasanzwe kuri Perezida Kabila, yashikirije ubutegetsi mu mwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 18 arongoye iki gihugu. Hagti aho, n'aho yari yashikirije ubutegetsi amaze gutsindwa mu matora, yagumanye ibibanza vyinshi mu nama nshingamateka y'igihugu, co kimwe no mu nama nshingamateka z'uburere.

column2: Papa Francis ati: 'Imana idukunda twese, n’aho woba uri umunyakibi ruhebwa'
column3: Papa Francis yahimbaje umunsi mukuru wa Noel avuga ko Imana idukunda twese - "Ninkozi z'ibibi ruhebwa". Yashikirije iryo jambo imbere y'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu gisabisho c'ijoro rya Noel kw'isengero rikuru i Vaticano ryitiriwe Umutakatifu Petero. Ati: "Ufise kuba  uri mu vyiyumviro bibi, ufise kuba warakoze ibi ruhebwa…ariko Imana ibandanya igukunda". Hari bamwe babona ko yashikirije ayo majambo afatiye ku mabi yagirizwa bamwe mu barongoye Ekleziya Katolika, harimwo ibijanye n'ugufata ku nguvu, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, Papa Francis aza gusubira mw'iyo sengero y'Umutakatifu Petero i Vaticano aho nk'uko vyama aza gushikiriza isi yose ijambo rya Papa risanzwe ryitezwe. Mu bitavye iyo misa harimwo abana batowe mu bihugu, harimwo nka za Venezuela, Irak na Uganda. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Roma, Mark Lowen, avuga ko vyerekana ko Papa afise ku mutima abakatolika baharurwa mu muliyaridi 1 n'ibice bitatu kw'isi, ashimikiye cane cane ku ngorane zihanze abimukira n'abari mu ntambara kw'isi yose. Uyo mu papa w'imyaka 83 akomoka muri Argentine yavuze ati: "Noel itwibutsa ko Imana ibandanya itwereka urukundo idufitiye, n'aho twoba turi abanyavyaha ruhebwa. Kuri jewe, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, uno munsi itubwira iti: 'Ndagukunda kandi nzokwama ndagukunda, kuko mu maso yanje uri ngirakamaro'". Imana ntigukunda kubera wiyumvira ugakora ivyiza. Igukunda ataco irabiyeko, vyonyene gusa. Urukundo rwayo ntiruva ku kungene umeze". Papa yanacishijemwo n'ibijanye n'amabi avugwa muri Ekleziya, hamwe n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo wa Ekleziya. Ati: "Nimba hari ibitagenda neza mu buzima bwacu, nimba hari ibitagenda neza muri Ekleziya, n'aho hoba ibibazo bimeze gute kw'isi, ivyo ntibizotubera inyendamuvano". Kuva mu bisagara vya Australia gushika mu mashure muri Irlande eka mbere no mu bisagara vya Amerika, Ekleziya Katolika yarahuye n'ibibazo vy'abayirongoye bagirizwa gufata ku nguvu abana kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze. Hari ibirego bikomeye n'abantu batanga ivyemezo vy'ivyo vyaha vyavuzwe cane mu matohoza abandanya akorwa. Mu biheruka, umukardinali wa Australia George Pell yarakubiswe intahe mu gahanga na sentare ko yafashe ku nguvu uduhungu tubiri two mu gisagara ca Melbourne muri Australia mu 1996. Uyo mukardinali yanahoze ajejwe ubutunzi i Vaticano - bisigura ko yaboneka nk'umutegetsi agira gatatu muri Ekleziya - niwe mutegetsi mukuru wa Ekleziya muri Australia yagirijwe ico caha. Mu ndwi iheze, Papa yarakoze impinduka zikomeye cane mu guhindura ibijanye "n'ibanga ry'ubupapa" ryatumye ivyo guhohotera abana vyakorwa n'abategetsi ba Ekleziya bisasirwa indava muri kahise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yaragira ibanga ibijanye n'ugufata abana ku nguvu, mu vyafatwa ko kwari ukugerageza kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe n'ababikoze. Ariko, ingingo nshasha yarakuyeho izo nzitizi zahora zibuza abantu kumenyesha ivyababayeko, canke ababibakoreye. Papa Francis agize iminsi atoroherezwa kuko hari benshi bamusaba gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo arwanye ako kabi kiziziye Ekleziya muri ino myaka ya vuba.

column2: CECAFA: Tanzania 4 - 0 Burundi, umumenyereza ati 'badusumvya ubuhinga'
column3: Mu rukino rwa kabiri rw'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'abagore mw'ihiganwa rya CECAFA, umurwi w'u Burundi ntiworohewe, kuko urukino rwarangiye utsinzwe na Tanzania ibitsindo 4-0. Umumenyereza w'uyo murwi aremera ko barushijwe, ariko akavuga ko bagiye kwikosora mu zindi nkino zimirije. Uburundi buri mu murwi B kumwe na Tanzania, Sudani y'Epfo, na Zanzibar, u Burundi buri mu kibanza ca kabiri n'amanota atatu, inyuma yo gutsinda Zanzibar ibitsindo 5-0 mu rukino rwa mbere rwabaye ku wa gatanu. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'aho u Burundi butsindiwe na Tanzania, Daniella Nibimenya, umumenyereza w'umurwi w'u Burundi, avuga ko ataco batagize. Ati: "Bakinye neza kandi bakurikije impanuro twabahaye, n'aho twatsinzwe twakinye neza". Avuga ko Tanzania yabatsinze kubera abakinyi bayo bazinanye kuko basanzwe bakinana kuva kera kandi ko babasumvya n'ubuhinga. Urwo rukino rwari rurindiriwe n'abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru benshi, na rirya abenshi mu bagize umurwi w'u Burundi harimwo abasanzwe bakina mw'ihiganwa rya Tanzania. "Twakinye aho tugeza, kandi haburana babiri hagatsinda umwe, ni ibisanzwe. Twatsinzwe uno munsi, ariko ihiganwa rirabandanya, tuzorurwana gushika ku kanyuma". Nibimenya avuga ko bagiye kwikosora kugira ngo baze bavyifatemwo neza mu nkino ziri imbere. Uburundi bwiteze guhura na Sudani y'Epfo mu rukino rutegekanijwe ejo ku wa gatatu isaha umunani mu masaha y'i Dar es Salaam. Iryo higanwa rya CECAFA ririko ribera i Dar es Salaam muri Tanzania ryatatanguye ku wa 16 z'uku kwezi rihuza imirwi umunani iva muri Uganda, Kenya, Ethiopia, Tanzania, Burundi, Djibuti Zanzibar na Sudani y'Epfo.

column2: Umupasitori aregwa gusambanya umukenyezi ku nguvu muri Nigeria yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora ishengero.
column3: Uyo mupastori asayangana , Biodun Fatoyinbo yari amaze imisi avugwa mu makuru iyi misi itatu iheze, inyuma yaho umukenyezi azwi cane mu gufata amafoto amwagiririje ko yamusambanije ku nguvu incuro zibiri imbere y'uko ashikana imyaka cumi n'umunani, haheze imyaka irenga cumi. Uyo mu pastori w'ishengero bita COZA rikundwa cane mu gisagara Abuja yanditse ku rubuga ngurukana bumenyi rwa Instagram kuri uyu musi wa mbere  ko yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera iyo nkuru yavuzwe cane. Hari abari bakoze  imyiyerekano mu mpera z'iyindwi mu bisagara bikuru bibiri vy'igihugu ca Nigeria arivyo Lagos na  Abuja. Basabira  ubutungane Busola Dakolo inyuma yaho amasanamu y'uwo mukenyezi  akwiragirijwe cane  ku mbuga  ngurukana bumenyi , avuga ko uyo mupastori yamusambanije ku nguvu. Uyo mu pastori wewe arabihakana. Igipolisi camenyesheje ko kitaramenya ibirego umukenyezi Dakolo yagirije uyo mu pastori  kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe arashikana ibirego nk'ivyo imbere y'ababijejwe. Igihugu ca Nigeria gifise abapastori benshi b'amasengero yemera Kristu y'abapentekoti, bamwe mu bapastori bakunze kwagirizwa kugira  inyifato itabereye.

column2: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
column3: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.
