column2: Covid-19: 83% vy'abanye-Afrika ntibararonswa urukingo rwa mbere - OMS
column3: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, avuga ko abanye-Afrika 83% batararonswa urukingo rwa mbere rwa Covid-19. Ivyo yabishikirije mu buryo bw'iyakure mu nama yabereye ku murwa mukuru wa Nigeria Abuja. Hari ku munsi hibukwa umwaka uheze Afrika ironkejwe inkingo za mbere za Covid muri wa mugambi wa Covax. Covax ni umugambi mpuzamakungu ugamije kuronsa bose ku buryo bungana inkingo za Covid. Dr Tedros yavuze ko uwo mugambi wadindijwe cane n'ivyo yise "ukwigungirako urukingo ku rwego rw'ibihugu". Ngo vyatewe kandi n'amashirahamwe ahingura imiti, yashira imbere ibihugu vyifise mu gutanga izo nkingo.

column2: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
column3: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

column2: Namibia: Abashingamateka bariyamiriza amasezerano ajanye n’ihonyabwoko ryakozwe na Germany
column3: Abashingamateka batavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi muri Namibia bariyamiriza reta ku mwumvikano uherutse kuba n'Ubudagi, igihugu catwaye Namibia mu gihe c'ubukoloni. Aya masezerano yatumye Ubudagi bwemera ko bwakoreye ihonyabwoko amoko y'aba Herero n'aba Nama, buca bwemera kuzoriha imiriyaridi 1.1 y'ama euro nk'indishi y'akababaro. Mw'ikoraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ry'ejo ku wa kabiri ryaranzwe n'induru nyinshi, umushingamateka wo ku ruhande rw'abatavuga rumwe yavuze ko ata mahirwe baronse yo kwerekana ingaruka mbi cane iri honyabwoko ryabateye rikabata mu bukene butagira izina. Uwundi nawe yavuze ko aba Herero n'aba Nama bakwiye kwiyamiriza aya masezerano abona ko ari ay'agasuzuguro. Umushikiranganji wa mbere, Saara Kuugongelwa-Amadhila, avuga ko ikintu nyamukuru ari uko abanya Namibia babandanya bafatanye mu nda. Mu ndwi iheze, icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yavuze ko ayo mafaranga Ubudagi bwemeye gutanga adakwiye, ariko ko ikibazo kizosubira kwigwa. Hagati ya 1904-1908, ingabo z'abakoloni b'Abadagi baragandaguye ibice birenga 80% vy'abanya Namibia bo mu bwoko bw'aba Herero n'aba Nama. Abahinga mu bijanye na kahise bafata aya mabi y'agahomerabunwa nk' "ihonyabwoko ryibagiwe" ryakozwe mu ntango z'ikinjana ca 20, muri ico gihugu citwa Intara y'Ubudagi mu Bumanuko bushira Uburengero bwa Afrika (German South West Africa/ Afrique allemand du Sud-Ouest). Mu kwezi guheze, Ubudagi bwasavye imbabazi kuri iri honyabwoko ryakozwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni inyuma y'ibiganiro - ikintu cari kirindiriwe imyaka n'imyaka, kandi kikaba ari co gihugu ca mbere gisavye imbabazi ku mabi nk'aya yakozwe n'iyari reta yaco ya gikoloni.

column2: Gasape: Urubuga hwaniro rwa mbere rutangujwe n'Umurundi
column3: Umurundi Saxe Perry Gateka asanzwe arongoye Radio Humuriza FM aheruka gutanguza urubuga hwaniro, rushobora kuba ari rwo rwambere rutangujwe n'umuntu ava muri ico gihugu. Urwo rubuga rukora co kimwe n'izindi zisanzwe zimenyerewe nka Facebook canke Twitter, aho abarwiyandikishako basangira amakuru yanditse, amafoto canke za video, ku buryo bwihariye bagashirako n'amajwi. Aho yavugana na BBC, Saxe Perry yavuze yuko yashatse kugira urubuga hwaniro rukora nk'izindi zihasanzwe mbere ngo rukagira ico ruzirushije. Yagize ati: "... nagerageje kwihweza izindi mbuga dusanzwe dukoresha nka za Facebook n'izindi, mugabo nkabona ko ari ibintu bikomeye cane umuntu atoshikako. WhatsApp igiye kwibandaniriza n'impinduka n'aho uwu mugambi wayo wateye induru Australia yashyizeho itegeko ryo gutuma Google na Facebook biriha amakuru Biden, ikibazo kuri Zuckerberg na Facebook "... naragize ivyigwa vya multimedia mu buhinga bwa kure ngerageje kuri internet, hanyuma ntangura gukora kugira nshobore kwihanga abantu b'abanyamahanga... nagize nti nshaka kwipima ku bihangange vya kure bikomakomeye.." Abajijwe ico urwo rubuga rwiwe rusumvya izindi, Saxe Perry yatanze akarorero avuga ko ku zindi mbuga nka Facebook canke Youtube udashobora gushirako amajwi yonyene, ariko ku rubuga rwiwe Gasape ivyo ngo birashoboka. Ku basanzwe bakoresha  Facebook na Youtube, urashobora gushirako ifoto canke video, ariko amajwi yonyene ukwayo, atari kumwe n'amashusho, ntibikunda. Ku kibazo co kumenya abaza ku rubuga Gasabe abo ari bo n'ico baba barondera, Saxe Perry yavuze   yuko ataramemya neza abaruzako abo aribo. Yagize ati: "...[runo rubuga] rushobora kuba ruriko rurakoreshwa  n'abantu bari hafi ya miriyoni zitatu. Rero sinovuga ngo ni Abarundi gusa, ariko ico nizera ni uko benshi muri bo ari Abarundi. "Ariko usivye ko harimwo n'abanyamahanga kuko turamaze kubona abantu basaba nk'ivyo twita 'ama verification y'ama page yabo', tugasanga abaturungikiye ivyangombwa vyabo ni abazungu, ni abanyamahanga. "Rero novuga yuko muri rusangi ari abantu bari kw'isi yose barukoresha... sinagomvye ko runo rubuga rwitwa urw'Abarundi gusa, ni nayo mpamvu rutiswe Gasape.bi, rwiswe Gasape.com..." Saxe Perry yamye ari umwana akerebutse. Mu mwaka wa 2005, afise imyaka 14 y'amavuko, akoresheje utwuma atoraguye hirya no hino, yarahinguye insamirizi (radio transmitter), ico gihe aca atangura kumenyekana no gushika ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aho niho yahereye ashinga Radio Humuriza FM ubu yumvikana mu ntara zishika icenda zo mu Burundi. Radio Humuriza FM mbere yahavuye ikorana na BBC Gahuzamiryango, icemerewe gukorera mu Burundi, aho yaza iracisha amakuru yayo kuri Humuriza FM. Mu 2017 yatowe muri wa mugambi wa Young African Leaders aja muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akarisha ubwenge mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye ari naho yakuye iciyumviro co gukora urubuga hwaniro. Agarutse yashinze Humuriza TV iboneka iciye ku buhinga bwa Facebook, uno mwaka naho rero akaba yatanguje urubuga hwaniro Gasape, ruboneka kuri internet co kimwe na application ija muri telephone ngendanwa. Saxe Perry avuga yuko ahanini mu bijanye n'uburyo akoresha yimenya, mu majambo yiwe akagira ati "jewe igihe cose namye ndya ikiremve ndacirasheko". Abandanya ati: "Nta muntu novuga ngo ariko aramfasha mu bijanye n'uburyo kuva ntangura runo rubuga kuko iyo mba nari mfise uburyo nari kurukora nko mu ndwi zibiri gusa." Yavuze yuko yamaze imyaka ibiri yegeranya uburyo yaba mu bijanye no kugura ama 'serveurs' canke kugura ibijanye n'umutekano kugira ntihagire abavogera urubuga rwiwe. Avuga kandi yuko mu gihe asanzwe arongoye ibitangazamakuru Humuriza FM na Humuriza TV, hari uburyo buboneka buvuye mu bamenyekanisha  ivyo bakora babicishije kuri ivyo bitangazamakuru.

column2: Ginette Karirekinyana yiyemeje kurwanya malaria akoresheje uburyo kama
column3: Malaria ni indwara ibangamiye ibihugu bikenye, ikaba iharurwa mu ntambanyi zibangamira iterambere rirama. Ginette Karirekinyana yemeza y'uko ishoboka gutuzwa burundu hakoreshejwe uburyo kama. Icegeranyo c'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu OMS mu kwezi kw'icumi uno mwaka, kivuga ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere gushika ku wa 20 z'ukwezi kw'icumi 2019, abantu barenga imiliyoni indwi baranduye malaria, abashika 2691 nabo irabahitana. Umupfasoni Karirekinyana yabwiye BBC ko yatanguje umugambi wo gukinga iyo ndwara akoresheje ivyo yita ivyatsi, ahinguramwo ibintu bitandukanye bikoreshwa mu kwirinda kuribwa n'imibu. Hagati aho, abona ko hakiri intambwe kugira Abarundi bose bawumve. Arongoye ishirahamwe ACECI (Agence Consultative en Ethique de la Coopération Internationale) rihingura ivyo vyatsi, akaba yanashinze ishirahamwe yise Karire Products mu 2016 ryo gukwiragiza ivyo ahingura. Umupfasoni Karirekinyana avuga ko yatanguje umugambi wiwe kubera yababajwe n'ukubona malaria yama ibica bigacika muri Afrika, mbere mu Burundi hoho ikaboneka nk'akaranda. Kubw'iwe , "nimba malaria ari ingorane ya Afrika, ibihugu vya Afrika vyo nyene ubwavyo bitegerezwa kuyironderera umuti". Ati: "Nico catumye kuva mu myaka ya 2007 gushika 2010 nguma niyumvira icokorwa kugira ngo twirinde malaria, atari ugukiza gusa, ahubwo kuyirinda", ico gihe akaba yari muri Canada. Avuga y'uko ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko hariho ibiti vyinshi bishobora kuvamwo imiti ya malaria, canke bigahingurwa kugira ngo havemwo ibintu bitari bike bishobora gukoreshwa mu kwikingira kuribwa n'imibu, iyo nayo ikaba ariyo itera iyo ndwara. Mu mwaka wa 2010, niho yafata ingingo yo gutanguza mu Burundi umugambi yise "Bayi bayi malaria" umugambi w'ukurima ivyatsi, cataria na Artemisia, yazanye mu gihugu abikuye muri Canada,  mu ntumbero yo kurwanya malaria. Umugambi wiwe wagiye kwemererwa mu Burundi mu 2011, aho umukuru w'igihugu ubwiwe ari we yawuguruye, hari ku wa 25 z'ukwa kane, umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe kurwanya malaria. Avuga ko intumbero yiwe ari ugufasha kurwanya iyo ndwara burundu kuko yasanze  abadandaza imiti ya malaria bobo badashira imbere ineza y'umuntu, ahubwo bishakira inyungu mu rudandaza rwabo. Ati : "Turavye abaza kugurisha imiti ya malaria mu Burundi, abenshi ntibaza bashaka gukiza canke gutuza iyo ndwara, ahubwo baza bashaka kugurisha imiti yabo n'ukwironderera ubutunzi". Mu mugambi wiwe, Karirekinyana avuga ko ashira imbere gukinga malaria akongera akanaha ubumenyi umunyagihugu buzomufasha kwikingira, ari naco gituma akwiragiza ivyo vyatsi mu gihugu cose. Muri ivyo vyatsi cataria na Artemisia, nk'uko we nyene avyita, arahinguramwo amasabuni be n'ubwoko bwinshi bw'amavuta yo kwisiga kugira ntibaribwe n'imibu. Arahinguramwo kandi n' ingaburo be n'inyobwa 'tisane'inyobwa nk'icayi, vyose bikoreshwa mu kurwanya malaria. Karirekinyana avuga ko amaze imyaka itari mike yigisha abanyagihugu uyo mugambi, akemeza ko abatari bake bamaze gusezera iyo ndwara. "Iyo nyigisho barayakiriye kandi abantu badukurikiye bagakurikirana inyigisho zacu kuva mu 2011, baza barategereye y'uko malaria itari ikwiye kwitwa ikiza, ahubwo ko bashobora kuyirinda". N'ubwo biri uko, malaria iguma ari ikiza Karirekinyana avuga ko mu Burundi hakiri ibintu vyinshi vy'ugukora kugira ngo abanyagihugu banyurwe n'uko malaria idategerezwa kuba ikiza. Avuga ko malaria ibandanya iba ikiza kubera y'uko leta itarashiramwo inguvu zayo, n'aho ishigikiye uwo mugambi n'ivyo ukora. Ati: "Gushika ubu irashigikiye uwo mugambi, mugabo ntirashobora kuza ngo dushire inguvu hamwe. Muri ico gihe rero, biragora y'uko twebwe nk'ishirahamwe rikiri ritoya n'uburyo butoya dushikira abanyagihugu bose". "Iyaba leta yari imaze kugira rwayo uwo mugambi, jewe novuga y'uko mu myaka itanu twoba tumaze gusezera malaria mu Burundi". Avuga ko uwo mugambi udashobora kubonwa neza n'amashirahamwe makuru makuru asanzwe akorana n'amahinguriro makuru makuru nyene kw'isi ahingura imiti. Karirekinyana avuga ati: "Abo ni abantu batarabona y'uko umuntu ariwe ashirwa imbere canke kurwanira, ni amashirahamwe ashira imbere inyungu". "Muca mwumva ko umugambi wo gutuza malaria  udashobora kwakirwa kubera woba uje kubakura amata mu kanwa". "Abo rero nibo ntambamyi ku Burundi no kuri Afrika mu mugambi wo kurwanya indwara nka malaria". Avuga ko muri ayo mashirahamwe hari ayamaze kwumva umugambi wiwe kandi ko yagerageje kumurwanya ariko ko yashoboye kurinda akibandaniriza intumbero yiwe. "Hagira hahere imyaka cumi dutanguye uwo mugambi, twarahanganye n'ibitari bike". Kubwiwe "malaria turashobora kuyisezera dukoresheje ivyo biti n'ivyo vyatsi. Ikiriho ni uko abantu batotinya ayo mahinguriro canke amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu usanga kenshi afise inguvu zirengeye iz'ibihugu". Gushika ubu Ginette Karirekinyana akorera mu ntara za Bujumbura na Gitega,ariko intego yiwe ikaba ari uko igihugu cose kimenya uwo mugambi.

column2: Arteta: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal afise umujinya inyuma y'aho Liverpool ibakubitiye 3-0 muhira
column3: Mikel Arteta avuga ko ari mu "mubabaro" akavuga ko ingene Arsenal yavyifashemwo mu gutsindirwa  muhira 3-0 na Liverpool ari "ibintu bidashobora kwihanganirwa". Uyu murwi w'Abarashi (The Gunners) nk'uko biyita warakubiswe bimwe bibi mu guterwa ibitsindo bitatu vyose mu gice ca kabiri c'urukino, Liverpool ikaba yarerekanye ko yisubije itoto inyuma y'imisi itari mike iri mu bibazo. Mu gihe hasigaye inkino umunani ngo ihiganwa rirangire, Arsenal iri inyuma amanota icenda yose kugira ngo ishobore gushika muri zine za mbere zifise uburenganzira bwo kuja muri rya higanywa rya Buraya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League/Ligue des Champions). Arteta ati: "Baradusumbije kabisa muri vyose. Vyose vyamvuyeko". "Turasaba imbabazi ku bantu baco n'abafana bacu". Arsenal, umurwi wigeze kuba rurangiranwa, uzwi ko mu mwaka wa 2003/2004 watsindiye ihiganwa utigeze utakaza urukino na rumwe, iri mu kibanza c'icenda mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, biboneka ko amahirwe yonyene isigaranye kugira ngo ishobore kuja muri Champions League, ni uko itsindira ihiganwa rya Europa League. Arsenal iheruka gukina muri Champions League mu 2016/2017, kuva ico gihe irirabira kure. Ku wa kane, izokwakira umurwi Slavia Prague wo muri Tchéquie (canke République tchèque/ Czech Republic) mu rukino rwa mbere rw'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma muri  Europa League. Arteta asaba abakinyi biwe guhagarara rugabo inyuma y'amarorerwa baraye bakorewe na Liverpool. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru inyuma y'urukino, Arteta yavuze ati: "Uno musi wari umubabaro mwinshi cane mu murwi. Ubu ndababaye cane kuko ni ibintu ntari niteze". "Ni ukuri ibi bintu ntibigasubire. Nishize mu kibanza c'umurwi n'abakunzi bawo, ibi ntibishobora kwihanganirwa. Ni ngombwa ko duhaguruka". "Ntegerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo nsubize ibintu mu buryo. Uno musi ibintu ntivyari vyifashe neza na gato". Jermaine Jenas,yahoze akina hagati muri Tottenham no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza aranegura ubuhinga Arteta yakoresheje. Ati: "Narorereye umurwi utari wizeye ubuhinga bwa Mikel Arteta". "Vyaboneka ko abakinyi ba Arsenal batari bamerewe neza. Basa n'uko ata shaka bari bafise ryo gukina canke ryo kurondera umupira canke ryo kurondera kwinjiza ibitsindo". "Ndiko ndibaza umubabaro abakunzi ba Arsenal bafise ubu". "Ni kangahe tubona Arsenal batakaza imipira inyuma bagaca batsindwa? Ubu ibintu bisigaye biteye isoni".

column2: Jeanne Gapiya - Covid niyahera tuzosanga hari benshi bahitanywe na Sida
column3: Jeanne Gapiya, umwe mu bazwi cane mu kurwanya Sida mu Burundi, avuga ko kwandura no kurwara Sida bishobora kwiyongera cane mu Burundi n'ahandi kuko uburyo bwo kubirwanya bwagabanutse cane kuva hateye ikiza ca Covid-19. Madame Gapiya ari mu bantu ba mbere bemanze ko bagendana umugera wa Sida mu Burundi mu myaka ya 1980,  igihe ibijanye n'uwo mugera vyari bikiri nk'ibitavugwa. Ishirahamwe ryiwe ryo gushigikira abagendana umugera wa Sida n'abarwaye iyo ndwara (ANSS)  rimaze hafi imyaka 30 kandi arashima aho we n'abandi bakora nkawe bari bagejeje igikorwa co kurwanya Sida. Madame Gapiya, atakiba mu Burundi igihe cose, avuga ko muri ino minsi yagiyeyo agasanga abarwayi ba Sida bamerewe nabi cane. Agira ati: "Nabonye umumama [umuvyeyi] aje kutwitura, yari amaze iminsi mu bitaro... nja kumuraba mbona umenga ni umwana w'imyaka nka  15. "Kubera dusanganywe ikigo gifasha abana barwaye cane , dushobora kuba turagumije, tubaha ivyo barya tubaha imiti gushika aho basubira kumera neza... "Ntangura kubwira abakozi nti jana urya mwana. Bati 'eka si umwana, ni umu mama w'abana 2'". Ibigo  birwanya Sida bisanzwe biha abarwayi bavyitura infungurwa zikenerwa cane kugira baronke intege zo kurinda iyo miti. Gapiya rero avuga ko yasanze ubu hari ubukene bw'ivyo kurya  kuko "uburyo twahora turonka ntabwo tukironka ngo tubafashe". Arongera ati: "Nagiye mu Kirundo, nsangayo uwundi muvyeyi tutazi ko tuzorokora,  afise igituntu akagira n'umugera, n'ibintu tutaheruka. "Ivyo vyose biterwa n'uko abantu bashonje kandi natwe ata buryo dufise bwo kubaha ivyo twahora tubaha". Madame Gapiya avuga ko imigambi mpuzamakungu yahora ibaha uburyo ubu yabuhindukirije mu kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19. Jeanne Gapiya avuga ko kuva habaye izi ngorane isi yose  irimwo z'ikiza ca Covid-19, gupima  umugera wa Sida bimaze kugabanuka ku rugero rwa 36%. Muri uwo mwanya  bisigura ko abagendana umugera batabizi bariko baranduza abandi. Agira ati: "Nitwagira imana n'ico kiza Covid tukagikira, tuzosanga twarasubiye inyuma, twarabuze abantu benshi cane". Ubundi avuga ko Uburundi bwari mu bihugu biteye imbere mu kurwanya Sida aho muri rusangi hagati ya  70 na 80% y'abategerezwa kuja ku miti  bayironka. Gusa urwo rugero ruracari hasi ku bana, rungana na 30%. Gapiya avuga ko abashikana ijwi kure ari ukubandanya basemerera kuko n'aho intambwe imaze guterwa, Uburundi n'ibindi bihugu na cane cane vyo muri Afrika y'ubuseruko n'iyo mu burengero ngo bikiri inyuma. Imiti igezweho ntirabishikamwo kandi abarwayi bayikenera kuko bishika bakananirwa n'iyo bari basanzweko. Avuga ko  we agira "amahirwe yo kuyironka kuko umushingatahe wanje akora muri Nations Unies [ONU]". "Uko siko ibintu vyategerezwa kugenda".
